articles.title: India vs Australia, 3rd ODI: Adam Zampa, Ashton Agar Star As Clinical Australia Hand India Rare Seri.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Australia defeated India by 21 runs in the third ODI to clinch the series 2-1 at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai on Wednesday
articles.content: The Indian batting unit once again choked under relentless pressure from the Australian spinners as the visitors clinched the three-match ODI series 2-1 with a comfortable 21-run victory, here on Wed… [+4465 chars]

articles.title: 'People compare to ABD': Calls for Sanju Samson's inclusion increase after Suryakumar Yadav's hat-trick of golden ducks - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav sensational fell to a third consecutive golden duck on Wednesday in the third ODI between India and Australia.  | Cricket
articles.content: If Suryakumar Yadav had an unusually extraordinary run in the buildup to the 2022 T20 World Cup, he is having the opposite of that now in the leadup to the 2023 ODI World Cup. Suryakumar fell for a s… [+2780 chars]
